griffon.core.artifact

Interface GriffonViewClass

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GriffonClass
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGriffonViewClass

    public interface GriffonViewClass
extends GriffonClass
    Represents a View class in Griffon.

    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray

    • Field Summary

      static String TYPE

      • Fields inherited from interface griffon.core.artifact.GriffonClass

        STANDARD_PROPERTIES

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] getEventNames()
      Matches all public methods and closure properties whose name matches the event handler convention, i.e, starts with "on" and is followed by at least one uppercase character.

      • Methods inherited from interface griffon.core.artifact.GriffonClass

        getApplication, getArtifactType, getClazz, getFullName, getLogicalPropertyName, getName, getNaturalName, getPackageName, getPropertyName, getPropertyValue, getPropertyValue, getShortName, hasProperty

    • Method Detail

      • getEventNames

        @Nonnull
String[] getEventNames()
        Matches all public methods and closure properties whose name matches the event handler convention, i.e, starts with "on" and is followed by at least one uppercase character.

        Returns:
        an array containing the names of all event handlers.
